Class ProjectController

java.lang.Object
com.SC2002.bto.control.ProjectController
public class ProjectController extends Object
ProjectController handles operations related to project management such as retrieving project listings, filtering, and toggling project visibility. Follows the Dependency Inversion Principle by depending on the service interface.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ProjectController()
    Constructs a ProjectController with the default project service.
    ProjectController(IProjectService projectService)
    Constructs a ProjectController with the specified project service.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectController

      public ProjectController()
      Constructs a ProjectController with the default project service.

    • ProjectController

      public ProjectController(IProjectService projectService)
      Constructs a ProjectController with the specified project service.
      Parameters:
      projectService - The project service

  • Method Details

    • bookFlatUnit

      public boolean bookFlatUnit(int projectId, String flatType)
      Books a flat unit in a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      flatType - The flat type to book (e.g., "2-Room", "3-Room")
      Returns:
      true if a unit was successfully booked, false otherwise

    • getAvailableProjects

      public List<Project> getAvailableProjects()
      Retrieves a list of available projects.
      Returns:
      a list of projects.

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      public boolean toggleProjectVisibility(int projectId, boolean isVisible)
      Toggles the visibility status of a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the identifier for the project.
      isVisible - the new visibility status.
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, false otherwise.

    • filterProjects

      public List<Project> filterProjects(String keyword)
      Filters the list of projects based on specific criteria (e.g., location, flat type).
      Parameters:
      criteria - a string representing the filtering criteria.
      Returns:
      a filtered list of projects.

    • getAllProjects

      public List<Project> getAllProjects()
      Retrieves a list of all projects without filtering by visibility. This method is specifically for HDBManagers who need to see all projects.
      Returns:
      a complete list of all projects regardless of visibility status.

    • getCurrentlyOpenProjects

      public List<Project> getCurrentlyOpenProjects()
      Retrieves a list of projects that are currently open for application. Projects are filtered by their application period (current date must be between opening and closing dates) and visibility.
      Returns:
      a list of currently open and visible projects.
